text: Martin Mystère is a fictional character from The Martin Mystère comics. He is a fictional detective from New York. He was born on 26th June 1942. His job is to investigate weird cases, usually accompanied with the caveman Java. He is one of the most known Italian comic characters. Martin also appeared in the animated series Martin Mystery, where he is a student. Fict Category:1942 births
title: Martin Mystère
